XXbsu015_u:1: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca /
XXbsu015_u:4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaekānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu015_u:5: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ kalpakoṭībhirbhāṣitam
XXbsu015_u:6: / ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya
XXbsu015_u:7: sarvavyādhipraśamanāya sarvapāpālakṣmiduḥsvapnapratinivāraṇāya sarvākālamṛtyupratinivāraṇāya aprasādānāṃ prasādanāya sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ praśamanāya /
XXbsu015_u:9: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigrahe śāntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣaprahāṇe kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikramet na praśamet nedaṃsthānaṃ vidyate sthāptya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyate /
XXbsu015_u:10: tadasya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu015_u:13: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍapratihataraṅgavelakiraṇarājasya nāma tathāgatasya /
XXbsu015_u:15: saha pratilaṃbhena daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatāḥ (Em 37) sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ
XXbsu015_u:16: evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ
XXbsu015_u:27: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati /
XXbsu015_u:36: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
XXbsu015_u:39: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvasmin karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ (Em 38) pratilabdham /
XXbsu015_u:40: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi /
XXbsu015_u:41: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittān dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
XXbsu015_u:43: mama bhagavanhṛdayam ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti /
XXbsu015_u:47: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati /
XXbsu015_u:49: tena nāmadheyamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so 'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutśatasahasrātirekasamam /
XXbsu015_u:56: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā /
XXbsu015_u:57: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum
XXbsu015_u:60: tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma /
XXbsu015_u:77: ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
XXbsu015_u:82: tadyathā ṭuru ṭuru hā hā hā hā svāhā /
XXbsu015_u:86: tadyathā thiri thiri dhiri dhiri svāhā /
XXbsu015_u:90: tadyathā sāde sāde sidi sidi sudu sudu svāhā /
XXbsu015_u:95: tadyathā yasi ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ muruḥ svāhā /
XXbsu015_u:97: anena mantreṇa jñātīnāṣṭai(?) ragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhudhṛtābhyaktānāmahorātrauṣikena ekena triṃśatā homaḥ kāryaḥ /
XXbsu015_u:99: namo ratnatrayāya nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
XXbsu015_u:100: tadyathā ili mili tili tili hili svāhā /
